body_html:
Thank you for bringing this to our attention @Anida-qin. It seems you did your homework and discovered a closed duplicate #3618 although it helps when you bring that to our attention.

It seems the Bazel site claims Ubuntu 14.04 is out of their support matrix, which I find peculiar, because that's what Google installed on my workstation. It's not EOL until 2019. It is in the TensorFlow support matrix. (Attn: @damienmg)

@Anida-qin GCC 4.8 is available on Ubuntu 14.04. If you were to apt-get install those, would it help?
